data.description: Our team is seeking an energetic, creative student for a software developer position in our WaveSuite portfolio. You will work closely with a dynamic team to develop rapid prototypes and cutting-edge solutions for the WaveSuite Product Portfolio. As part of an Agile development team, you will design, implement, and validate modular software components in Java, partnering with team peers to deliver seamless software components. WaveSuite centralizes multiple network management and operations functionalities in one unified platform for the Nokia Optical Network Product Portfolio. The system allows network planning and operations staff to plan, deploy, manage, and monitor the network over the total life cycle. The system enables automation of network operations via detection, analysis, action, and an AI framework.
